email.description: Receive email updates about your projects

dashboard.overview: Here's an overview of your SEO performance

stats.averagePositionTooltip: Average position across all tracked keywords

recentProjects.title: Recent Projects
recentProjects.loadError: Failed to load dashboard data. Please try refreshing the page.
recentProjects.createFirst: Go to projects to create your first one

hero.title: Boost Your SEO Performance
hero.subtitle: Track, Analyze, Improve
hero.description: Get actionable insights and improve your search rankings with our comprehensive SEO toolkit.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to succeed
features.description: Our comprehensive suite of SEO tools helps you optimize your website and improve your search rankings.

items.title: Keyword Tracking
items.description: Monitor your search rankings and track progress over time

items.title: Backlink Analysis
items.description: Discover and monitor your backlink profile

items.title: Technical SEO
items.description: Identify and fix technical SEO issues

projects.title: Projects

errors.loadingDesc: Failed to load projects. Please try again later.

projects.empty: No projects yet. Create your first project to get started!

form.name: Project Name
form.nameDesc: Enter the name of your project
form.urlDesc: Enter the URL of your website
form.gaPropertyDesc: Optional: Enter your GA4 property ID
form.gscSiteDesc: Optional: Enter your verified GSC site

auth.title: Authentication Error
auth.description: Google Analytics authentication has expired. Please reconfigure in settings.

users.title: Users
users.tooltip: Number of unique visitors over the selected period.

pageViews.title: Page Views
pageViews.tooltip: Total number of pages viewed during the selected period.

sessionDuration.title: Avg. Session Duration
sessionDuration.tooltip: Average length of user sessions in seconds.

bounceRate.title: Bounce Rate
bounceRate.tooltip: Percentage of sessions in which users left without taking further action.

clicks.title: Search Clicks
clicks.tooltip: Total number of times users clicked through to your site from Google search results

impressions.title: Search Impressions
impressions.tooltip: Total number of times your site appeared in Google search results

ctr.title: Search CTR
ctr.tooltip: Click-through rate: clicks divided by impressions

position.title: Avg. Position
position.tooltip: Average ranking position in Google search results. A lower number is better!

empty.title: No backlinks found
empty.description: You can add your backlinks manually.

table.title: Backlinks
table.description: A list of all backlinks pointing to your website

sourceUrl.label: Source URL
sourceUrl.tooltip: The URL where the backlink is located

targetUrl.label: Target URL
targetUrl.tooltip:
Your page that is being linked to.
Should be a page from your website.

anchorText.label: Anchor Text
anchorText.tooltip:
The clickable text of the backlink.
Important for SEO relevance.

linkType.label: Link Type
linkType.tooltip:
DOFOLLOW: Passes SEO value
NOFOLLOW: No SEO value
UGC: User generated content
SPONSORED: Paid links

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: This will permanently delete the backlink. This action cannot be undone.
